name: Swalot
description: The Poison Bag Pokémon. Swalot has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, no matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile tire could easily fit inside this Pokémon's mouth.

abilities.name: Liquid Ooze
abilities.description: If an enemy uses a leeching or absorb move against this Pokémon, the Pokémon must make a DC 12 CON save or become poisoned.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: Held items cannot be stolen or knocked away from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: This Pokémon must eat its held berry when it falls below ½ of its maximum HP.
